Title: Weather Sky Bad
Items: The heavens release thier fury upon you today, as a stinging rain assaults all the realm
Black clouds and devilish lightning harken the cold rain that soon follows
Ominous thunder begins in the night, and the dark clouds never let the sun through as hail begins to fall
Hail assaults you today, falling from frightening stormclouds towering above the realm
The driving rain soaks everything to the bone today, falling from a rolling blanket of ink-black cloudcover
Rain falls constantly, punctuated by concerningly-close lightning strikes illuminating an otherwise dark day
The weather is terrible today, with fat, drenching rain making it difficult to see very far
Storm clouds hover over the land today, refusing to leave until they have sowed misery for everyone save the farmers
Dark clouds and heavy rain cause flash flooding in lowlying regions today
The deluge is upon the realm today, with rain and endless black clouds keeping the sun's warmth from ever reaching the ground
